CustomField.formula: IF(CRM_Type__c='STO' || CRM_Type__c='STB' || CRM_Type__c='BTO', CRM_Theme_Group__r.Name & IF(CRM_Type__c='BTO', ' - Beskjed til oss', ' - Skriv til oss') & IF(ISBLANK(CRM_Closed_Date__c), '', ': Henvendelsen er avsluttet'), IF(ISPICKVAL(CRM_Thread_Type__c, 'AAREG_EXP'), AAREG_Thread_Subject__c, 'Chat'))
CustomField.label: STO - External Name
